lines.text:
[stammers]
But you can't quit, Bugs. You-you've made our network, er, uh, number one.
Sorry, pal, but what you need for a president is someone less sensitive than me.

[pounding his fist on Bugs's desk]
I'm not sensitive about *nothin*'!
Someone not afraid to make raw decisions.
I'm about as raw as you're a-gonna get!
That fool made a fool outta me, but I've got another rotten idea. Network Sam never gives up!

[silences Sam's gunshots]
Hold it, Sam. What if I make you a Vice President in charge of Specials?
Phew. It pays to be a good negotiator.
[chuckles]
I dunno, Mr. Fudd. What is it that has four legs and flies?
A horse in summertime, stupid!
I give up, Mr. Fudd. Why is the state of Ohio different?
Because it's high in the middle and wound on both ends! O-HI-O!
Hey, pinhead, you know how to make Auntie fweeze?
Yeah, hide her nightgown!
Little does the varmit know I'm gonna be the head honcho around here!
[laughs manically]
[last lines]
You know why I'll...
[stammers]
put you on as, uh, President, Sam?

[earnestly]
Why?

[staring him in the face angrily]
Uh, so as I can fire you!
[he kicks Sam out the window and he plummets into a fountain down below]
Now can you see why it's so lonely at the top?

[appearing at the fountain]
And so wet at the bottom!
[laughs]
Tell us about your life, Bugs.
Oh...
[chuckles shyly]
I'm - I'm so unimportant.
Start from the beginning.
Well, in the beginning, there was no life. The earth was forming.
No, no, that's too far back!

[about to throw a pie in Elmer's face from behind a studio door]
Remember, you're asking for it!
Yeah, I gotta find that wabbit or my caweer will be wuined.
Oh there you are. Where have you been? You're on in three minutes, you know; come on, come on, hurry!
[guides Elmer into the dressing room]
But - but I'm not...

[closing the dressing room door]
Oh come on, come on now. Get in your costume. Hurry, hurry, hurry!
[angle change to Bugs watching Elmer undress]
Oh, hurry up!
[Elmer emerges from the room, wearing a rabbit costume]
Oh, how darling!
But I...

[guiding Elmer to the substage launch room]
Quick now, right in there.
